build_app_description: The app is currently being customized just for you!
short_password_description: Password must be at least 8 characters
password_dont_match_description: The two passwords you entered do not match, please try again
phone_exist_description: This phone number is already registered in our system. Please go to the login screen and try again
phone_not_valid_description: The phone number seems invalid. Please try again
email_exist_description: This email is already registered in our system. Please go to the login screen and try again
email_not_valid_description: The email seems invalid. Please try again
user_not_found: This email was not found. Please try again
too_many_requests: Too many requests for this account
operation_not_allowed: Server error. Please try again later
default_error: Login or registration failed. Please try again
invalid_credential: Incorrect email or password. Please try again
mail__recover_sent_description:
Please click the link in the email.
If you don’t see the email, check the spam folder or try again
upload_dog_image: Upload a picture of the dog
otp_code_description:
You received an SMS with a verification code.
Please enter it and click OK
phone_not_exist_system: Phone number does not exist in the system
explanation_screen_title: Guide to Creating the Perfect Surprise
first_password:
Set an initial password. Your partner can change the password.
If left blank, the password will be 123456

choose_color(context=GenderContext).male: Choose a color from the palette
choose_color(context=GenderContext).female: Choose a color from the palette

got_full_app: You got a full app just for this!
title: Title
we_use: We will use the selected texts to build a personalized app
more_few_seconds: In a few seconds, we’ll start building the perfect gift!

sure_logout(context=GenderContext).male: Are you sure you want to log out?
sure_logout(context=GenderContext).female: Are you sure you want to log out?

greeting_first_login(context=GenderConte.male:
$name has prepared the coolest surprise for you!
An app built especially for your birthday!
Here you will find a heartfelt personal blessing,
shared photos of your most beautiful moments,
and more surprises to warm your heart,
because you deserve all the best in the world!
Get ready, this will be an unforgettable celebration! 🎉🎉🎉
greeting_first_login(context=GenderConte.female:
$name has prepared the coolest surprise for you!
An app built especially for your birthday!
Here you will find a heartfelt personal blessing,
shared photos of your most beautiful moments,
and more surprises to warm your heart,
because you deserve all the best in the world!
Get ready, this will be an unforgettable celebration! 🎉🎉🎉

text_description(context=GenderContext).male: Come on, write a heartfelt blessing or some funny text!
text_description(context=GenderContext).female: Come on, write a heartfelt blessing or some funny text!

pictures_description(context=GenderConte.male: Add some shared pictures that will melt your hearts
pictures_description(context=GenderConte.female: Add some shared pictures that will melt your hearts

videos_description(context=GenderContext.male: Add YouTube videos that remind you how cute you are together
videos_description(context=GenderContext.female: Add YouTube videos that remind you how cute you are together

quiz_game_description(context=GenderCont.male: Build a trivia game to see if you know who's who!
quiz_game_description(context=GenderCont.female: Build a trivia game to see if you know who's who!

birthday_calendar_description(context=Ge.male: Plan the coolest and most fun schedule for your partner's birthday! Create a perfect day filled with surprises and unforgettable activities.
birthday_calendar_description(context=Ge.female: Plan the coolest and most fun schedule for your partner's birthday! Create a perfect day filled with surprises and unforgettable activities.

birthday_suprise_description(context=Gen.male: Create a birthday surprise, but shhh... it stays locked until your partner opens it!
birthday_suprise_description(context=Gen.female: Create a birthday surprise, but shhh... it stays locked until your partner opens it!

wishes_list_description(context=GenderCo.male:
Let $name choose 3 wishes:
Write a little "contract" so they can't go overboard!
wishes_list_description(context=GenderCo.female:
Let $name choose 3 wishes:
Write a little "contract" so they can't go overboard!

title_appear_category: The title to appear for this category

sure_delete_name(context=GenderContext).male: Are you sure you want to delete $text?
sure_delete_name(context=GenderContext).female: Are you sure you want to delete $text?

sure_delete(context=GenderContext).male: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
sure_delete(context=GenderContext).female: Are you sure you want to delete this event?

generate_text_description:
Write a birthday blessing for $relationship, the name is $name
My name is: $myName
Number of lines in the blessing: $lineNumber
Number of words per line: $wordsInLineNumber
The age is $age
greeting_notes:
* Your names will be automatically added
* Your partner's age will be automatically added
* After receiving the blessing, you can edit it however you'd like

suprise_screen_description(context=Gende.male:
Add text or pictures, play with their order, and create the perfect surprise!
The surprise will remain secret until you decide it's ready for your partner!
suprise_screen_description(context=Gende.female:
Add text or pictures, play with their order, and create the perfect surprise!
The surprise will remain secret until you decide it's ready for your partner!

secret_dialog(context=GenderContext).male: "$categoryName" is locked until $name grants you permission to open it!
secret_dialog(context=GenderContext).female: "$categoryName" is locked until $name grants you permission to open it!

delete_wishes_description(context=Gender.male: If the wishes don’t align with the contract, you can delete them and $name can refill them
delete_wishes_description(context=Gender.female: If the wishes don’t align with the contract, you can delete them and $name can refill them

wish_list_lock_description: To unlock it, please ask $name for a new chance

please_read_contract(context=GenderConte.male: A contract written by $name especially for you
please_read_contract(context=GenderConte.female: A contract written by $name especially for you

question: Question
required_fill_question: You must fill in the question
required_fill_all_answer: You must fill in all the answers

choose_question_delete(context=GenderCon.male: Select the questions you want to delete
choose_question_delete(context=GenderCon.female: Select the questions you want to delete

mark_least_one_question: You must mark at least one question

quiz_game_partner_description(context=Ge.male:
Welcome to the trivia game!
$name has prepared $number intriguing questions for you.
❤️ Reminder: You cannot change an answer once given, so answer carefully and have fun 😉
Good luck!
quiz_game_partner_description(context=Ge.female:
Welcome to the trivia game!
$name has prepared $number intriguing questions for you.
❤️ Reminder: You cannot change an answer once given, so answer carefully and have fun 😉
Good luck!

you_answer_from: You answered correctly $answers out of $questions questions

upload_six_images(context=GenderContext).male: Upload 6 images for the memory game
upload_six_images(context=GenderContext).female: Upload 6 images for the memory game

memory_game_description(context=GenderCo.male: Create a fun memory game with 6 shared pictures of you two!
memory_game_description(context=GenderCo.female: Create a fun memory game with 6 shared pictures of you two!

memory_game_lock_description: To unlock it, please ask $name for a new chance

memory_game_done(context=GenderContext).male: $name finished the game with a score of $score
memory_game_done(context=GenderContext).female: $name finished the game with a score of $score

cant_upload_more_than(context=GenderCont.male: You cannot upload more than $number files
cant_upload_more_than(context=GenderCont.female: You cannot upload more than $number files

locked_category:
This category is locked.
To unlock it, upgrade your plan in the settings
watch_login_success:
Successfully logged in!
You can now switch to the clock
no_owner: The user is not an administrative user
please_open_app_in_phone: Please open the app on your phone to log in
failed_send_login_request: Failed to send login request to phone. Please try again
no_category_added: No categories have been added for this event
